promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong ibex fighting-type pokemon wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Braceram, a a massive strong ibex fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Cliff Edge Formation, Negative Ion. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "fighting" or "Braceram". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, ibex-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This robust mountain monarch commands its territories with Cliff Edge Formation and Negative Ion. Agile yet formidable, it's often sought after in arena confrontations.
